import { useState } from "react"; import "./App.css"; function App() { const [username, setUsername] = useState("Paco Rabany"); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [bio, setBio] = useState(""); const [gender, setGender] = useState("m"); const [userType, setUserType] = useState("individual"); const [tac, setTac] = useState(true); return (
setUsername(e.target.value)} value={username} />
